abstract: From a New Delhi news conference on the eve of a Formula One race, Lady Gaga talked of reincarnation and Osho with journalists.
snippet: From a New Delhi news conference on the eve of a Formula One race, Lady Gaga talked of reincarnation and Osho with journalists.
lead_paragraph: "Performance art is my life. The idea is to create a fantasy that is so great that when we are together, it feels very real." So said Lady Gaga at a news conference in New Delhi, and so she has.With 15 million followers on Twitter, the most in the world, and 44 million 'likes' on Facebook, the 25-year-old Grammy-winning artist, has redefined what it means to be popular.

headline.main: Muppets, Warhol and Rebirth: Lady Gaga Holds Court in India
